info.title: Notamify API
info.description: API for fetching NOTAMs (with AI interpretation) and generating briefings

get.description: Fetches NOTAMs for the given locations and date range

parameters.name: dry_run
parameters.description: Flag to perform a dry run without fetching NOTAMs

parameters.name: always_include_est
parameters.description: Flag to always include estimated NOTAMs into the briefing

value.ai_interpretation: Due to reduced system capacity, all VFR aircraft destined for CYVR, excluding CAM9 and helicopter traffic, are required to contact YVR ACC (1-800-668-1333) between 30-90 minutes prior to departure for an approved arrival time.
value.ai_short_interpretation: VFR aircraft destined for CYVR need to contact YVR ACC 30-90 minutes before departure for an approved arrival time.
value.all:

Q) CZVR/QFAXX/V/NBO/A/000/999/4912N12311W005

E) DUE TO REDUCED SYSTEM CAPACITY ALL VFR ACFT DESTINED FOR CYVR 
EXCLUDING CAM9 AND HEL TFC, ARE REQUIRED TO CTC YVR ACC

x-codeSamples.label: Python

get.description: Generates a briefing for the given locations, date range, and role

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Role for which the briefing is generated

parameters.name: dry_run
parameters.description: Flag to perform a dry run without generating the briefing

parameters.name: always_include_est
parameters.description: Flag to always include estimated NOTAMs into the briefing

parameters.name: detailed_briefing
parameters.description: Flag to generated detailed briefing. The flag set to 'false' generate shorter briefings

value.summary: Briefing summary for the given locations and date range

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key. Check if the key is signed.
